issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
/Volumes/HHD/opt/node/lib/node_modules/npm/bin/npm:2
(set -o igncr) 2>/dev/null && set -o igncr; # cygwin encoding fix
        ^^^^^
SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier
    at Module._compile (module.js:439:25)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:474:10)
    at Module.load (module.js:356:32)
    at Function.Module._load (module.js:312:12)
    at Function.Module.runMain (module.js:497:10)
    at startup (node.js:119:16)
    at node.js:929:3

!ENTRY com.appcelerator.titanium.update.core 4 4 2015-01-06 00:50:24.361
!MESSAGE Error encountered during update
!SUBENTRY 1 com.aptana.js.core 4 0 2015-01-06 00:50:24.361
!MESSAGE Failed to install titanium. Please see the Studio log for more information.
!SUBENTRY 1 com.aptana.js.core 4 0 2015-01-06 00:50:24.361
!MESSAGE Failed to install alloy. Please see the Studio log for more information.
!SUBENTRY 1 com.aptana.js.core 4 0 2015-01-06 00:50:24.362
!MESSAGE Failed to install acs. Please see the Studio log for more information

h3. Actual Result
/Volumes/HHD/opt/node/lib/node_modules/npm/bin/npm:2
(set -o igncr) 2>/dev/null && set -o igncr; # cygwin encoding fix

fields.summary: When I update titanium, Studio catches an error

comments.body:
Hi,

I only see the error info, Please provide the reproduce steps and the symptom of your problem.
Thanks.

Regards,
Shuo

Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "*Update Appcelerator Studio*" is working fine for me. I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126.
I recommend you upgrade studio to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.
I will mark this ticket as "resolved" since I can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information if you notice otherwise.
Thanks
